description:
You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the location, and the people. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, 30 mins. train ride to Manhattan 15 min to Stadium. 10 minutes walk to Subway and Bus.basement apartment ,not suitable for anyone over  6fts,adults preferred.

Entire area available to guest.

I can be reach at most times if necessary

Subway and train 15 minutes away from building  30 minutes ride to NYC
name: Private,Convenient,CozyComfort !!
